statements: SELECT * FROM top_selling_products_reports;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products_reports WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_date FROM top_selling_products_reports ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products_reports WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
SELECT MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales_amount FROM top_selling_products_reports;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM top_selling_products_reports ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, sales_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM top_selling_products_reports WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM top_selling_products_reports WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM top_selling_products_reports ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM top_selling_products_reports GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(sales_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_sales WHERE sales_channel = 'Online' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT product_name, price, sales_channel FROM product_sales WHERE sales_channel = 'Offline'
SELECT product_name, price, sales_channel FROM product_sales ORDER BY sales_channel DESC
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_sales WHERE sales_channel = 'Online' AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, sales_channel FROM product_sales WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM top_selling_products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM top_selling_products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_channels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT channel_id, channel_name, sales_volume FROM sales_channels WHERE sales_volume > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM top_selling_products;
SELECT * FROM sales_channels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM top_selling_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales FROM sales_channels;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 30;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales LEFT JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.customer_age, sales.sale_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_age < 30 ORDER BY sales.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC, product_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 40 ORDER BY customer_name, customer_gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' AND product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, sales.sale_date, sales.sale_quantity FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sales.sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, demographics.gender, demographics.occupation FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE demographics.marital_status = 'Single' ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC;
